entry.data:
SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 30S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
NOT AS COOL WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 50S
SOUTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 40
SOUTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

SHOWERS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN NEAR 100 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING
HIGHS AROUND 60
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 20S
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 20S
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 40S
